text: @realDonaldTrump @NYCMayor Imagine a President so feeble that America's rate of new COVID19 infections would be EIGHT TIMES HIGHER THAN THE EU's and so vain he won't even wear a mask to set an example even tho masks save lives.  Imagine a President who has ALREADY KILLED AT LEAST 60,000 AMERICANS. https://t.co/yeL7z41KaI
